basics.name: Yhanessa Anne Sales
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.A. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2023.

education.institution: University of Hawaii at Manoa, Honolulu, HI
courses: ICS 111 - Introduction to Computer Science I (Java Programming)
ICS 211 - Introduction to Computer Science II (Data Structures)

highlights: Develop a functionality to enhance the contextual fields of a web application for an agency that issues licenses for school educators in Hawai’i, providing valuable insights for the agency to improve their overall processes and service to users
Resolving the problem will result in accurate data being sent to the system and clients
Apply a hybrid of Waterfall and Agile approach for project management
Utilize a Model-View-Controller web framework with these underlying tools: Bootstrap CSS, jQuery, Twig UI template engine, PHP Slim micro framework, MySQL, Git, NetBeans, MySQL Workbench
Utilize WordPress, HTML, and PHP to create appealing elements to enhance the current theatre website by improving user interface and experience and organizing content
Apply technical skills and attention to detail to ensure a user-friendly and easy-to-navigate site that accurately represents the theatre and its offerings to attract a wider audience
Greeted and welcomed guests as they enter the venue, using interpersonal skills to establish a sense of trust and ensuring a positive experience for all guests
Assisted with event preparation for events up to 300 guests, ensuring smooth execution while maintaining high standards of quality and attention to detail
Responded to guest’s questions, complaints, and requests in a timely manner, utilizing excellent customer service skills to provide comprehensive solutions and ensure guest satisfaction
Greet and welcome over 600 guests each work day
Assess guest needs in a timely manner and provide solutions
Validate guest reservations by using an online booking software called FareHarbor
Manage guest arrivals through phone calls
Greet newly seated guests to offer water
Support waitstaff to ensure the satisfaction of guests
Ensure a clean and sanitized table after guests' departure
Multitask in a fast-paced environment by cleaning and setting tables in a timely manner while performing side tasks
Rehearse 4.5 hours each week to deliver entertaining halftime shows at football games
Attentive at all times to the conductor as they use non-verbal and visual cues
Learned dedication and self-discipline to ensure successful performance of the 200+ member band
Multitask by playing an instrument and marching to memorized music and drills

awards.title: Dean's List
awards.summary: Awarded to Undergraduate students who earned a semester grade point average of 3.5 or higher based on 12 or more credits

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.
